chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
m: X -> X -> X
u: X
Hmonoid: monoid_theory m u
n: nat
y: X
x: X

Goal:
x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x -> mscal n x ⊕ y = y ⊕ mscal n x

Premises:
monoid_theory : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> Prop
mscal = fun (n : nat) (x : X) => ∑ n (fun _ : nat => x) : nat -> X -> X Arguments mscal _%nat_scope
monoid_assoc : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z
mscal_S : forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal (S n) x = x ⊕ mscal n x
mscal_plus1 : forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal (S n) x = mscal n x ⊕ x
VectorDef.fold_left : (?B -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?B -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right : (?A -> ?B -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> ?B -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n) -> Fin.t (p + ?m) -> Fin.t (p + ?n) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- nat] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : Fin.t n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
VectorSpec.fold_left_right_assoc_eq : (forall (a : ?A) (b c : ?B), ?f (?f a b) c = ?f (?f a c) b) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (a : ?A), VectorDef.fold_left ?f a v = VectorDef.fold_right (fun (x0 : ?B) (y0 : ?A) => ?f y0 x0) v a where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type] ?f : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- ?A ->...-> ?A]
mscal_plus : forall (a b : nat) (x : X), mscal (a + b) x = mscal a x ⊕ mscal b x
Fin.eq_dec : forall x0 y0 : Fin.t ?n, {x0 = y0} + {x0 <> y0} where ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n0 v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n0 v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X ->...-> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
msum_comm : forall (a : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ⊕ a = a ⊕ f i) -> ∑ n f ⊕ a = a ⊕ ∑ n f
measure_rect2 : forall (X Y : Type) (m : X -> Y -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y), m x' y' < m x y -> P x' y') -> P x y) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y), P x y
monoid_unit_r : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m x u = x
monoid_unit_l : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x
msum_sum : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f j ⊕ g i = g i ⊕ f j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⊕ g i) = ∑ n f ⊕ ∑ n g
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x : X y : X |- Type]
msum = fix msum (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) {struct n} : X := match n with | 0 => u | S n0 => f 0 ⊕ msum n0 (fun n1 : nat => f (S n1)) end : nat -> (nat -> X) -> X Arguments msum _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Init.Nat.div = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => fst (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.div (_ _)%nat_scope
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
Init.Nat.modulo = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => y' - snd (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.modulo (_ _)%nat_scope

```coq
intros.
induction n.
- simpl. rewrite H. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHn. rewrite mscal_plus1. rewrite <- mscal_plus1. rewrite monoid_assoc. rewrite monoid_assoc in H. rewrite <- monoid_assoc in H. rewrite H. auto.
Qed.

original: intros. induction n. - simpl. rewrite H. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHn. rewrite mscal_plus1. rewrite <- mscal_plus1. rewrite monoid_assoc. rewrite monoid_assoc in H. rewrite <- monoid_assoc in H. rewrite H. auto.
